name: Urgot
title: the Dreadnought
shortBio: Once a powerful Noxian headsman, Urgot was betrayed by the empire for which he had killed so many. Bound in iron chains, he was forced to learn the true meaning of strength in the Dredgeâ€”a prison mine deep beneath Zaun. Emerging in a disaster that spread chaos throughout the city, he now casts an imposing shadow over its criminal underworld. Raising his victims on the very chains that once enslaved him, he will purge his new home of the unworthy, making it a crucible of pain.

skins.name: Giant Enemy Crabgot
skins.description: Emerging from the deep sea as the first of the kaiju menace, Crabgot has never been completely defeated by the forces of humanity. The best result when it emerges is to temporarily halt its advance, sending the massive crustacean back into the sea... until it can rise once more.

skins.name: Battlecast Urgot
skins.description: A titanium juggernaut used to crush pockets of particularly stubborn resistance, the Battlecast Urgot model is rarely seen but widely feared. Its extensive weapons systems are complemented by a massive, flesh-grinding spike mill, which it pulls fleeing opponents into for sheer spectacle.

skins.name: High Noon Urgot

chromas.name: High Noon Urgot

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

skins.description: Jeremiah James was once a famed railroad baron and millionaire industrialist, who bet his own heart on a game of chanceâ€¦ and lost. Left alone in the desert to die, he bargained with a passing devil, trading his immortal soul for a twisted, monstrous body of gears and iron.

skins.name: Pajama Guardian Cosplay Urgot

chromas.name: Pajama Guardian Cosplay Urgot

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: A Star Guardian superfan of almost impossible proportions, Urgot worked really hard on this outfit for the fan meet, so please be respectful.

skins.name: Fright Night Urgot

chromas.name: Fright Night Urgot

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.description:
Unctuous Uncle Urgot has no nose to smell
No feet or toes to stink, but he's still feeling swell
'Cause visitors arrive and ring the household bell
With new parts not so rotten for him, and tummy snacks as well!

skins.name: Urgot the Clogfather

chromas.name: Urgot the Clogfather

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2025.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2025.

skins.description: The Clogfather isn't just a janitorâ€”he does all sorts of wetwork. He stalks the stalls, sanitizes the sinks, tidies the toilets... So it's not his fault if he's a little flush-happy. It comes with the territory.

passive.name: Echoing Flames
passive.description: Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.

spells.name: Corrosive Charge
spells.description: Fires an explosive charge at the target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies caught in the explosion.
spells.dynamicDescription: Urgot fires an explosive charge, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ physical damage</physicalDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> by @SlowAmount*100@% for @SlowDuration@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Purge
spells.description: Urgot slows himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions Urgot has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Passive: Urgot's other Abilities mark the last champion hit for 5 seconds.

Active: Urgot begins firing his chain gun at the closest enemy, prioritizing marked enemies. He Attacks them @Effect8Amount@ times a second dealing @DamagePerShot@ physical damage per shot. Urgot can move while firing and has @Effect2Amount@% Slow resistance, but loses @Effect5Amount@ Move Speed.

At max rank, this Ability lasts indefinitely and can be Toggled on and off.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Disdain
spells.description: Urgot charges in a direction, shielding himself and trampling non-champion enemies. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them out of his way.
spells.dynamicDescription: Urgot charges forward, gaining <shield>@ETotalShieldHealth@ Shield</shield> for @EShieldDuration@ seconds. The first champion hit is <status>Stunned</status> for @StunDuration@ seconds and thrown behind Urgot. All enemies Urgot collides with take <physicalDamage>@EDamage@ physical damage</physicalDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Fear Beyond Death
spells.description: Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Urgot fires a chem-drill, impaling the first champion hit, dealing @RCalculatedDamage@ physical damage and Slowing for @RSlowDuration@ seconds by 1% per 1% missing Health, up to @RMoveSpeedMod@%.

If the impaled victim falls below @RHealthThreshold@% Health, Urgot can Recast this Ability, Suppressing the victim and dragging them to himself. On reaching Urgot, they are killed and nearby enemies are Feared for @RFearDuration@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
